extendedInfo.description: Have the need to feel good?  Why not give Come Puffy a try?Come Puffy is a unique, fast paced, and fun-filled game that will satisfy your craving to swipe away at that touch screen!Puffy the Puffer Fish is a bit of a buffoon, both clunky and clumsy. In spite of this, gorgeous and elegant Tristy wants him to come spend time with her. You must swim Puffy through diverse mazes and obstacles, avoiding deadly enemies along the way, to get him to Tristy as quickly as possible. Try to find as much treasure as you can while you're en route to help woo Tristy over!Come Puffy is highly entertaining game that can be enjoyed by all ages. It's easy to learn but will take a lifetime to master, and will inevitably bring a smile to your face.

reviews.comment: Simple and fun. Perfect for kids, great for adults. Definitely worth the money.
reviews.author: Diddly D

reviews.title: I love this l game!
reviews.comment: This is a good game for kids and the kids at heart. It was a fun game and I am sure that it will keep the kids occupied for hours.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: fun game
reviews.comment: it\'s simple but very fun.  addicting!
reviews.author: David L
